note: I start doing photography in 1999. My first camera was a Konica Z-UP 110 after I Upgrade to the Konica Z-UP 120 then the Konica Z-Up 150. In 2005 I jump to Digital with Kodak EasyShare DX4530, then in 2008 the Fujifilm FinePix S2000HD. Since 2014 I was using Fujifilm X-A2 I sold it now. I can say that I was really miss a viewfinder that I found easier to shoot with it. So in the near future I will buy the Sony A7 Mark II. My two strengths are Portrait and Macro.
